subject: Football
lead_paragraph: John Skelton threw touchdown passes of 87 and 50 yards to lead host Fordham to a 16-0 victory against Rhode Island. Xavier Martin led the Rams with 169 yards on 29 carries. Rain and wind forced a postponement Saturday.
snippet: John Skelton threw touchdown passes of 87 and 50 yards to lead host Fordham to a 16-0 victory against Rhode Island. Xavier Martin led the Rams with 169 yards on 29 carries. Rain and wind forced a postponement Saturday.
